participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, always looking for new ways to stay fit.
participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a passion for teaching and capturing moments through photography.
participant_2.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. my favorite colors are red and silver. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher.

content.text: Hey! Are you bored? Because I am.
